foreignData.name: Tarnzauber-Leger
foreignData.text:
Aufblitzen
Fliegend
Wenn der Tarnzauber-Leger ins Spiel kommt, lege alle Auren, die eine bleibende Karte deiner Wahl verzaubern, an eine andere bleibende Karte des gleichen Beherrschers an.

foreignData.name: Hiladoras de ilusiones
foreignData.text:
Destello.
Vuela.
Cuando las Hiladoras de ilusiones entren en juego, anexa todas las auras que estén encantando el permanente objetivo a otro permanente objetivo con el mismo controlador.

foreignData.name: Fileurs d'illusions
foreignData.text:
Flash
Vol
Quand les Fileurs d'illusions arrivent en jeu, attachez toutes les auras enchantant le permanent ciblé à un autre permanent ayant le même contrôleur.

foreignData.name: Tessitori di Insidie
foreignData.text:
Lampo
Volare
Quando i Tessitori di Insidie entrano in gioco, assegna tutte le Aure che incantano un permanente bersaglio a un altro permanente controllato dallo stesso giocatore.

foreignData.name: 魔法を回す者
foreignData.text:
瞬速
飛行
魔法を回す者が場に出たとき、パーマネント１つを対象とする。それにつけられているすべてのオーラを、コントローラーが同じである他のパーマネント１つにつける。
foreignData.type: クリーチャー — フェアリー・ウィザード

foreignData.name: Pivotantes de Glamir
foreignData.text:
Lampejo
Voar
Quando Pivotantes de Glamir entrar em jogo, anexe todas as Auras encantando a permanente alvo a outra permanente com o mesmo controlador.

foreignData.name: Прядильщики Заговоров
foreignData.text:
Миг
Полет
Когда Прядильщики Заговоров входят в игру, прикрепите все Ауры, зачаровывающие целевой перманент, к другому перманенту под контролем того же игрока.

foreignData.name: 幻法旋舞师
foreignData.text:
闪现
飞行
当幻法旋舞师进场时，将结附在目标永久物上的所有灵气结附到另一个永久物上，且两个永久物的操控者须相同。

name: Glamer Spinners
originalText:
Flash
Flying
When Glamer Spinners comes into play, attach all Auras enchanting target permanent to another permanent with the same controller.

rulings.text: When Glamer Spinners enters the battlefield, you target only one permanent: the one that will be losing its Auras. You don’t choose the permanent that will be receiving the Auras until the ability resolves.
You may target a permanent that has no Auras enchanting it.

When the ability resolves, you choose the permanent that will be receiving the Auras. It can’t be the targeted permanent, it must have the same controller as the targeted permanent, and it must be able to be enchanted by all the Auras attached to the targeted permanent. If you can’t choose a permanent that meets all those criteria, the Auras won’t move.

text:
Flash
Flying
When Glamer Spinners enters the battlefield, attach all Auras enchanting target permanent to another permanent with the same controller.
